backend.medicalservice.AdminClerk.services

Interface PatientService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatientServiceImpl

    public interface PatientService
    This service interface defines the operations related to patient management.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addpatient(PatientEO patient)
      Add a new patient entity to the system.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> allAadharNumber()
      Retrieve a list of all Aadhar numbers belonging to patients in the system.
      void deletePatient(java.lang.String aadharNumber)
      Delete a patient entity using their Aadhar number.
      java.util.List<PatientEO> getAllPatients()
      Retrieve a list of all patient entities.

      Retrieve a patient entity using their Aadhar number.

      Update an existing patient entity using their Aadhar number.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPatients

        java.util.List<PatientEO> getAllPatients()
        Retrieve a list of all patient entities.
        Returns:
        A list containing all patient entities in the system.

      • addpatient

        void addpatient(PatientEO patient)
        Add a new patient entity to the system.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient entity to be added.

      • updatePatientByAadharNumber

        void updatePatientByAadharNumber(java.lang.String aadharNumber,
                                 PatientEO updatedPatient)
        Update an existing patient entity using their Aadhar number.
        Parameters:
        aadharNumber - The Aadhar number of the patient to be updated.
        updatedPatient - The updated patient entity.

      • deletePatient

        void deletePatient(java.lang.String aadharNumber)
        Delete a patient entity using their Aadhar number.
        Parameters:
        aadharNumber - The Aadhar number of the patient to be deleted.

      • getPatientByAadharNumber

        PatientEO getPatientByAadharNumber(java.lang.String aadharNumber)
        Retrieve a patient entity using their Aadhar number.
        Parameters:
        aadharNumber - The Aadhar number of the patient to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The patient entity associated with the provided Aadhar number, or null if not found.

      • allAadharNumber

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> allAadharNumber()
        Retrieve a list of all Aadhar numbers belonging to patients in the system.
        Returns:
        A list of all Aadhar numbers associated with patients.

      • getPatientByEmail

        PatientEO getPatientByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Retrieve a patient entity using their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the patient to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The patient entity associated with the provided email, or null if not found.
